attributes.action: ensure that OFSTED are fully accountable and that when their reports are found inaccurate they are withdrawn or re-written
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Summerhill School was inspected in 1999, its Ofsted report threatened it with closure. After winning its appeal in the Royal Courts of Justice, recieving a 16 page adjudication heavily critising the Ofsted report, and then gaining a positive review inspection (unpublished) the 1999 report is still published and used in assessing the school.
